text: Guetta Blaster is an album. It is the second one by French DJ David Guetta. It was released by Virgin Records on September 13, 2004. ==Track listing== #"Money" (Radio Edit) (feat. James Perry) - 4:01 #"Get Up" (feat. Chris Willis) - 3:03 #"Last Train" (feat. Miss Thing) - 3:07 === Bonus tracks and footage=== All bonus tracks appear on the digipak limited edition of Guetta Blaster. #"Old School Acid" (feat. James Perry) - 3:18 #"Stay" (Remix) (feat. Chris Willis) - 3:27 All bonus tracks and footage appear on the CD/DVD edition of Guetta Blaster. #"Stay" (Fuzy Hair RMX edit) (feat. Chris Willis) - 4:45 #"The World is Mine" (Deep Dish RMX edit) (feat. JD Davis) - 4:07 #"Old School Acid" (feat.
